title: Astylish Womens High Waisted Wide Leg Jeans Cropped Straight Leg Denim Pants
description: Material: Astylish cropped wide-leg jeans for women are made from soft, stretchy denim that feels comfortable and breathable. They're comfy and have a trendy short length, perfect for warm days
Features: This wide leg jeans features five functional pockets;high waisted;crop style;zipper and button closure
Occasion: These jeans are comfy for all your day's activities – running errands, meeting pals, or daily tasks. They've got you covered
Match: Wear these jeans with a simple tee or tank for an easy-going look. Dress them up with a blazer or jacket for something smarter. Finish with a standout bag to add flair to your trendy outfit
